Text.content:
Element settings are rendered by the page handler of the JSON API. See the JSON properties settings.hsize, settings.linkOption, settings.pieceLayout, and so on.

GET /json/sites/default/mercury-json/demo-3/sample-page/index.html
{
  "containers": [
    {
      "elements": [
        {
          "containers": [],
          "formatterKey": "m/section/json",
          "path": "/sites/default/mercury-json/.content/section-m/cs_00002.xml",
          "settings": {
            "hsize": "2",
            "linkOption": "button",
            "pieceLayout": "6",
            "textOption": "default",
            "visualOption": "99"
          }
        },
        {
          "containers": [],
          "formatterKey": "m/section/json",
          "path": "/sites/default/mercury-json/.content/section-m/cs_00002.xml",
          "settings": {
            "hsize": "2",
            "linkOption": "button",
            "pieceLayout": "7",
            "textOption": "default",
            "visualOption": "99"
          }
        },
  ...
}
